commitMessage: @@@[fixes http://code.google.com/p/mybatis/issues/detail?id=410 ] Added new settings defaultListResultHandlerType and defaultMapResultHandlerType to change List/Map implementation that are returned from MyBatis. The default implementations are ArrayList/HashMap (not changed).

@@@Merge pull request #1007 from hazendaz/master

[tests] Ensure resources are closed fixing sonar issues

Change to calling BaseDataTest#runScript on setup test data
